body_html:
@angersson

Thank you for your response. I think it may become a feature, because the numpy lib support columns opertaions and there is lines opertaions in tensorflow. It might be confused that tf is not support columns operations and we have to use while_loop to update data. I think it might be not convenient.

So, if you ( or your team) have a plan to update operations, it might be a good attempt to add columns operations.
